content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 6, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft prismarine_brick_slab, I need to place 3 prismarine_bricks in the crafting grid. The first one will go in slot 1.
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 6, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}]
thought: The second prismarine_brick will go in slot 2, next to the first one.
act: move from slot 33 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 6, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}]
thought: Finally, the third prismarine_brick will go in slot 3, completing the crafting recipe.
act: move from slot 33 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 6, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that the prismarine_brick_slab has been crafted, it can be moved to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
